thread.title: In a city like Beijing with language being a biggest problem .. Every time we reached back hotel it felt like a home
thread.title_full: In a city like Beijing with language being a biggest problem .. Every time we reached back hotel it felt like a home - Review of Grand Hyatt Beijing, Beijing, China - TripAdvisor

author: vamshidhary
title: In a city like Beijing with language being a biggest problem .. Every time we reached back hotel it felt like a home
text: Excellent staff , thou not proficient in English right from bellboy to house keeping women , they were helpful n always smiling and trying to help.. It's my first time in Beijing and can't stop raving about this place
